item.title: G.Gershwin & B.Heyward - Summertime
item.description:
Summertime
an’ the living is easy
Fish are jumping
an’ the cotton is high
Oh yo’ daddy’s rich
An yo’ ma
is good looking
So hush little baby
don’t you cry
One of these morning
you going to
rise up singing
Then you’ll
spread yo’ wings
an’ you’ll take
the sky
But till that morning
there’s a nothing
can harm you
With Daddy
an’ Mammy
standing by.

One of these morning
you going to
rise up singing
Then you’ll
spread yo’ wings
an’ you’ll take
the sky
But till that morning
there’s a nothing
can harm you
With Daddy an’ Mammy
standing by.
